description: Implement the basic structure of the policy gradient algorithm. For simplicity, just set up the function.

prompts.prompt: Implement the 'policy_gradient' function to set up the basic structure of the policy gradient algorithm.

Define a function named 'policy_gradient' that sets up the basic structure for the policy gradient algorithm. For this problem, the function will not take any arguments and does not need to implement the full policy gradient logic. It should just return a non-null value, representing that the basic structure is set up. You might want to extend this function to implement the complete algorithm in the future.
